snippet: Feral hogs are the latest foe being taken on by the Jefferson Parish Sheriff’s Office. Hogs on the parish’s west bank are rooting up grass that keeps wind and rain from eroding levees.
abstract: Jefferson Parish Sheriff's Office in Louisiana is being paid $25,000 by flood protection authority agency to kill wild hogs for one year; animals are rooting up grass that keeps wind and rain from eroding levees.
lead_paragraph: Feral hogs are the latest foe being taken on by the Jefferson Parish Sheriff’s Office. Hogs on the parish’s west bank are rooting up grass that keeps wind and rain from eroding levees.

headline.main: Louisiana: Sheriff’s Office Will Dispatch Pig-Killing Posses
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Sheriff’s Office Will Dispatch Pig-Killing Posses
